metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5421 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description: An attacker who is logged into OTRS as an user with privileges to create and change customer user data may manipulate the CustomerID field to execute JavaScript code that runs immediatly after the data is saved.The issue onlyoccurs if the configuration for AdminCustomerUser::UseAutoComplete was changed before. This issue affects OTRS: from 7.0.X before 7.0.47, from 8.0.X before 8.0.37; ((OTRS)) Community Edition: from 6.0.X through 6.0.34.

notes.Note: sbeattie> possibly fixed in otrs2 in 6.0.35, which was a bunch of fixes backported from znuny; this may mean that it was already fixed in znuny

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
